mapper.select: select * from announce order by idx desc
mapper.update: UPDATE announce SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
UPDATE announce SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, file_original = #{file_original}, file_system = #{file_system}, file_extension = #{file_extension} WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBER_NAME, q.CONTENT, q.WDATE, q.CATEGORY, q.ISANSWERED, q.PARENT_IDX, q.idx FROM qnaservice q, MEMBER_INFO m WHERE q.member_idx = m.member_idx ORDER BY m.member_idx
mapper.update: UPDATE (SELECT q.ISANSWERED , q.content, q.parent_idx FROM qnaservice q, MEMBER_INFO m WHERE q.member_idx = m.member_idx ORDER BY m.member_idx) SET ISANSWERED = 'Y', parent_idx = ${idx}
